scripts.lint: eslint src/ $@ && yarn run build && yarn run web-ext lint --source-dir build/ --warnings-as-errors
scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && cp -R src/ build/ && yarn node -e "require('fs-extra').copySync(require.resolve('webextension-polyfill'), 'build/js/lib/webextension-polyfill/browser-polyfill.js')"
scripts.package: yarn run build && yarn run web-ext build --source-dir build/ --artifacts-dir dist/ --overwrite-dest $@
